welcome_message_body: Welcome to Romford, a charming town known for its historic market, beautiful parks, and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that Romford has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all cargo and freight operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal

terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
